ij.plugin

Interface PlugIn

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AboutBox, Animator, ArrowToolOptions, AVI_Reader, BatchConverter, BatchMeasure, BatchProcesser, BMP_Reader, BMP_Writer, BrowserLauncher, CanvasResizer, Channels, ChannelSplitter, ClassChecker, Clipboard, ColorPicker, Colors, ColorThresholder, CommandFinder, CommandLister, Commands, Compiler, CompositeConverter, Concatenator, ContrastAdjuster, ContrastEnhancer, ControlPanel, Converter, DICOM, Distribution, DragAndDrop, Duplicator, Editor, EventListener, FFT, FFTMath, FileInfoVirtualStack, FITS_Reader, FITS_Writer, Fitter, FolderOpener, Fonts, GelAnalyzer, GifWriter, GroupedZProjector, Histogram, Hotkeys, HyperStackConverter, HyperStackReducer, IBA_J, ImageCalculator, ImageJ_Updater, ImagesToStack, Installer, JavaProperties, JpegWriter, LineWidthAdjuster, ListVirtualStack, LUT_Editor, LutLoader, Macro_Runner, MacroInstaller, MeasurementsWriter, Memory, MemoryMonitor, MontageMaker, NewPlugin, NextImageOpener, Options, Orthogonal_Views, OverlayCommands, OverlayLabels, PasteController, PGM_Reader, PlugInFrame, PNG_Writer, PNM_Writer, Projector, ProxySettings, Raw, Recorder, RectToolOptions, Resizer, RGBStackConverter, RGBStackMerge, RoiManager, RoiReader, ScaleBar, Scaler, ScreenGrabber, Selection, SimpleCommands, Slicer, SpecifyROI, StackCombiner, StackEditor, StackInserter, StackMaker, StackReducer, StackReverser, StackWriter, Straightener, SubstackMaker, SurfacePlotter, TextFileReader, TextReader, TextWriter, ThreadLister, ThresholdAdjuster, Thresholder, Timer, URLOpener, WandToolOptions, WindowOrganizer, XYCoordinates, Zoom, ZProjector

    public interface PlugIn
    Plugins that acquire images or display windows should implement this interface. Plugins that process images should implement the PlugInFilter interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(java.lang.String arg)
      This method is called when the plugin is loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(java.lang.String arg)
        This method is called when the plugin is loaded. 'arg', which may be blank, is the argument specified for this plugin in IJ_Props.txt.
